text: Musa nalobola Abandu amakhumi saba(abalayi) mubandu baye, khundache yefu, mana omurengo omukhongo shingala kwaboolela Musa naboola; “Nyasaye wanje, wenyanga wakhabasishiye halala ninasi khale. Ukhusishia khulwo khubeela akabasilu bakhola mwifwe? kano shikali 7. halali amatemo koko, khuko olekha yakora owawenya, ne olunjisia owawenya , ewe newe omuliindi wefu, khokhuleshele ebionono biefu mana okhubeele tsimbabaasi, nawe newe omulesheli omulayi muno owabalesheli.’’
